**Microcleavage**
Transfer a sample containing ~1-2 mg
Dry peptide-resin to a small syringe \(2 mL).
Add 300 μL of the cleavage cocktail \[TFA/ H<sub>2</sub>O/ phenol/
TIPS 8.5/ 0.5/ 0.5/ 0.5] to the dried peptide resin,
Stir gently for 30 sec and
Wait for 3 h \(
Stir gently in-between).
Collect the solution in a small HPLC vial,
Dilute with 400 μL ACN/water 1/1, mix.
At this point the solution can be analyzed in an analytical HPLC system \(
Inject 20 μL) and/or further diluted \(1/10) to be injected \(2 μL) in LC-MS.
